div.span:
🏢 Sperse Platform
Returns tenant-specific data:
• Product details
• Available payment methods
• Price options
• Configurations

📋 Product Selection Page
Shows:
• Product information
• Price options
• Payment methods (Stripe/PayPal/Spreedly)
• Based on tenant config

💳 User selects payment method
Form POST to checkout.php
with tenantId, publicName, optionId, gateway

🛒 Checkout Page
• Loads product from session
• Shows customer form
• Pre-selects payment gateway

📝 User fills form
Customer info, billing address
Then clicks 'Pay with [Gateway]'

📡 PHP calls SubmitProductRequest
POST /api/services/CRM/PublicProduct/SubmitProductRequest
With full customer + product data

🎯 Sperse Orchestration
• Creates lead in CRM
• Routes to correct gateway
• Returns hosted checkout URL

✅ Success Page
Shows invoice details
Payment confirmation
